dialog: Hey there, do you have any wizardly spells that can send these cards to the EU? They tend to be less expensive that way.
Alright, here you go. That'll be 18 gold coins and 72 silver pieces.
That's one more gold coin, friend.
Awesome, thanks a ton. You've been a great help.
Good evening, Saliva. What's that magical scent coming from your kitchen? What're you up to?
Are you skilled in the culinary arts?
I just graduated from a wizardly cooking academy! I'm planning on opening up a restaurant, so I've been putting my skills to the test.
What a fantastic idea! What are you whipping up at the moment?
I'm using my magic to steam some fish in a pressure cauldron. Have you ever tried steamed fish?
I have, but I must say the one I had at that particular eatery was not exactly appetizing. The fish was undercooked and a bit too salty.
Yeah, I know what you mean. I think the chef didn't allocate enough time for steaming and used too much of a certain herb.
I agree. But let's not dwell on that, shall we? Please give this one a try.
Thank you! Mmm, this is delicious!
Glad you like it! Your approval means a lot to me.
Aside from steamed fish, what other dishes are you skilled in?
I'm quite talented in creating dishes such as beef stew with potatoes, fried chicken, hot and sour soup, and the like.
